title: Autoformat URL's to hyperlinks
content:
I include many URL's in my Thunderbird email composer. I am unable to find a way to set the Thunderbird to autoformat URL as hyperlink, for instance,

https://nameofdomain.com I have to go to Insert> Link to make the email appear as hyperlink a la word autoformat.

I just discovered that when I do type a URL and once sent the link is formatted to the sendee. This is very minor thing but is there a way to see the URL autoformatted live as typed in the "Write:"/compose window of Thunderbird?

Thanks for any comment
